dialogue.name: Noah
dialogue.text: So, you're saying that fairies look like this?

dialogue.name: Fairy
dialogue.text: How do you humans imagine fairies to be?

dialogue.name: Noah
dialogue.text: Nowadays, in cartoons, school, and books, fairies look like little fairies with wings and magic wands.

dialogue.name: Fairy
dialogue.text: Well, I do have wings, hahahaha.
He showed me his tiny wings, which seemed to be spread apart by fat.
Maybe that's why he sounded like a hummingbird, because they were working at full capacity to keep that amount of fat in the air?

dialogue.name: Fairy
dialogue.text: So, you're gonna give me your tooth, right?

dialogue.name: Noah
dialogue.text: I've always wanted to ask, why do you even need teeth?

dialogue.name: Fairy
dialogue.text: *crunch* Huh?!

dialogue.name: Noah
dialogue.text: What are you eating?

dialogue.name: Fairy
dialogue.text: Teeth, what else?

dialogue.name: Noah
dialogue.text: So you collect them... to eat?

dialogue.name: Fairy
dialogue.text: You could say that. But in reality, they hold the power to create new memories.

dialogue.name: Noah
dialogue.text: Why do you need memories? Are they tasty?

dialogue.name: Fairy
dialogue.text: Of course they're tasty, what did you think, kid?

dialogue.name: Noah
dialogue.text: Can I eat my tooth?

dialogue.name: Fairy
dialogue.text: I know what you're thinking, but don't even try it. With a body like yours, you'll just hurt your throat.

dialogue.name: Noah
dialogue.text: What? I didn't want to eat my tooth, it's still my memories!

dialogue.name: Fairy
dialogue.text: You're a smart kid, well done.

dialogue.name: Fairy
dialogue.text: Listen, kid, I need to fly on, collect teeth.

dialogue.name: Fairy
dialogue.text: If you're interested in the taste of teeth, find at least one other person's tooth and I can turn you into a fairy.

dialogue.name: Noah
dialogue.text: I can become a fairy?!?!
He flew away without answering my question.
I couldn't sleep for a long time after that.
But literally a couple of minutes later, I was fast asleep.
